effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.

short_effect.sun_moon: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user handles a sharp leaf like a sword and attacks by cutting its target. Critical hits land more easily.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user handles a sharp leaf like a sword and attacks by cutting its target. Critical hits land more easily.
